description: Try our easy to follow Flower Power Eton Mess With Berryworld Strawberries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Eton mess,Pescatarian,Strawberry,Gluten free,Vegetarian,Christmas leftovers,Leftovers,Quick & easy dessert
name: Flower Power Eton Mess With Berryworld Strawberries Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour thickened cream into a mixin bowl. Add vanilla bean paste and icing sugar.
Beat the cream mixture until soft peaks form. Once the cream is complete, set aside briefly.
Place 1 whole mini meringue in each bowl and then crush another meringue on top of this.
Add a heaped tablespoon (or two) of the whipped vanilla bean cream on top of the meringues.
Pile on generous helpings of chipped strawberries and decorate with edible flowers.
